title: Classic Margherita Pizza
description: A timeless Italian pizza with fresh tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and basil.
formula: Mix flour, salt, water, and olive oil to form a dough. Knead for 10 minutes.
Roll out dough, spread tomato sauce, and add mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 7-10 minutes or until the crust is golden brown.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves before serving.

reviews.comment: The best homemade pizza I've ever made!
Great recipe, but I added oregano for extra flavor.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Roman pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
formula: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta in a pan until crispy. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Whisk eggs with Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Combine hot spaghetti with pancetta and garlic. Remove from heat and mix in the egg mixture quickly.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

reviews.comment: Simple and delicious! Just like in Rome.
Great recipe, but I used bacon instead of pancetta.
